text: Innum (intap poli vicuvacikal) iman kontirupporaic cantikkum potu, "nankal iman kontirukkirom" enru kurukirarkal; anal avarkal tankal (talaivarkalakiya) saittankalutan tanittirukkumpotu, "niccayamaka nankal unkalutantan irukkirom; niccayamaka nankal (avarkalaip) parikacam ceypavarkalakave irukkirom" enak kurukirarkal
